text: aho visvasa kalavuni! allah veta avamka pascattapayakin pascattapa vi yomu vanu. numbalage paramadhipati numbalage papayan numbalagen paha kota evata pahalin gamgavo gala basna (svarga) uyan valata numbala va ætulat karannata puluvana. edina nabivarayata ha ohu samaga vu visvasa kalavunata allah avaman nokarayi. ovunge alokaya ovun idiripasin da ovunge dakunupasin da diva yayi. “apage paramadhipatiyaneni, apage alokaya apata purnavat kara denu mænava! tavada apahata samava denu mænava! niyata vasayenma numba siyalu dæ kerehi saktiya ættaya.” yæyi ovun pavasanu æta
